video.title: Taxes for freelancers & startups
video.description:
Learn the best way to set up your freelance business for tax purposes from an experienced freelancer. This video is specifically focused on taxes in the United States.

Note: Neither Luke or freeCodeCamp in any way hold themselves out as providing tax or financial advice. You should discuss such issues with a licensed professional.

Also check out Luke's beginner's guide to starting your own freelance development business: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fsTzLgra5dQ

IRS Form 2553: https://www.irs.gov/forms-pubs/form-2553-election-by-a-small-business-corporation

Follow Luke:
🔗  SEO For Lawyers- https://www.seo-for-lawyers.com/
🔗  Cincinnati Website Builders- https://www.cincinnati-website-builders.com/
🐦 Twitter- https://twitter.com/luke_ciciliano

--

Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.com

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://medium.freecodecamp.com

topLevelComment.author: Jai
topLevelComment.text: Great video! Straightforward, you made things very clear and easy to understand. Thanks!

topLevelComment.author: tyrus ramirez
topLevelComment.text: do you also need to pay the state income tax?

topLevelComment.author: iVuDang
topLevelComment.text: I'm an accountant, and I can safely tell you guys, this guy is a BOSS. Everything he is saying is relevant.

topLevelComment.author: Eric Hepperle
topLevelComment.text: Thanks Luke! One Question: Is an S-Corp still worth it if only make $10K or less freelancing?

topLevelComment.author: Crystal C.
topLevelComment.text: Thank you! This was very helpful

topLevelComment.author: Todd Paben
topLevelComment.text: Very helpful!  I feel underwhelmed, in the sense that you didn't overwhelm me with too many details.  I might actually go for it after seeing this!  Thanks!

topLevelComment.author: Narendiran Dorairaj
topLevelComment.text: Nice video.. thanks for doing this. If you could clarify about how do you purchase health insurance that would really helpful.. thanks again

topLevelComment.author: Joe Oviedo
topLevelComment.text: Thanks! Wondering about all these things, we are looking to incorporate ourselves in the US, because we need stripe usa for international payments, stripe in my country is still in preview and its been in preview for 18 months!!! so no more waiting :(

topLevelComment.author: Jason Kim
topLevelComment.text:
I've had it explained to me a few times but the way you outlined each tax entity was really clear and concise. I recently started out on my own and this will help me make decisions about how I can approach these matters.
 Thank you for making this video.

topLevelComment.author: Thassany Pothikan
topLevelComment.text: Great video! If you are wanting to calculate accurate taxes in the US, this App will help you tremendously: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.codingfriend.quarterlytaxes

topLevelComment.author: Coding Morrison
topLevelComment.text: Great video, saved for future reference!
